termsOfUse.terms_of_use_intro_1: Goodtobenaked offers panty sales services and related marketplace services for personal use via our website goodtobenaked.com.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_intro_2: You must be at least 18 years old to register and use our Goodtobenaked Services. When using our Goodtobenaked services, you must comply with these terms of use, follow our instructions, and adhere to applicable laws. Goodtobenaked services in these terms of use refer to our Goodtobenaked site as well as all content (information, documents, files, texts, logos, graphics, images, materials, software and other content) provided or made available via our Goodtobenaked site.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_1: By accessing or using our Goodtobenaked services, you agree to be bound by these terms of use, which constitute a legally binding agreement between you and us regarding all matters related to our services. These terms of use include our privacy policy and any other terms or policies available through our Goodtobenaked services. In the event of a conflict between these terms of use and other terms or policies, these terms of use prevail unless expressly stated otherwise. General terms used in these terms of use are not limited by specific examples introduced by 'including', 'for example' or similar expressions.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_2: We reserve the right to modify these terms of use at any time at our sole discretion, by making the modified terms of use available on our Goodtobenaked site. You agree to be bound by these modified terms of use by continuing to access or use our Goodtobenaked services after the modified terms of use have been made available on our site. You are responsible for regularly reviewing the terms of use available on our Goodtobenaked site each time you use our Goodtobenaked services. If you do not accept these terms of use, you must immediately stop accessing and using our Goodtobenaked services.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_3: To be authorized to register to use our Goodtobenaked services: you must be at least 18 years old and capable of entering into these terms of use as a legally binding agreement between you and us; and your use of our Goodtobenaked services must not violate applicable laws, including, without limitation, any applicable law in the country from which you access our Goodtobenaked services. You agree to provide us with all identification documents we request to verify your identity and confirm your age when you register to use our Goodtobenaked services.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_4: By registering to use our Goodtobenaked services, you represent and warrant that: you are at least 18 years old and capable of entering into these terms of use as a legally binding agreement between you and us; all information you provide to us to register to use our Goodtobenaked services is accurate, complete, and up-to-date; your use of our Goodtobenaked services will not violate any applicable law, including, without limitation, any applicable law in the country from which you access our Goodtobenaked services; and you will not knowingly allow a minor to access or use our Goodtobenaked services.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_5: You agree to promptly update all information you provided to us to register to use our Goodtobenaked services if such information is no longer accurate, complete, and up-to-date. We are not responsible for any loss or damage you suffer because we, or any other user or third party, have relied on the information you provided to us to register for our Goodtobenaked services and which is not accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_6: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to refuse to register you to use our Goodtobenaked services for any reason, including, without limitation, if you: provide us with information that is not accurate, complete, and up-to-date; attempt to register more than once; or attempt to register a username that you do not have the legal right to use or that is determined by us, at our sole discretion, as being inappropriate or unsuitable for any reason.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_7: You must at all times maintain the security and confidentiality of your password for your account on our Goodtobenaked services. You must immediately notify us and change your password if you suspect or become aware that another person has made or may make unauthorized use of your account. You must not knowingly allow another person to use your account to access our Goodtobenaked services or use another user's account to access our Goodtobenaked services.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_8: You agree that: you are solely responsible for any use of our Goodtobenaked services when another person uses your credentials to access our Goodtobenaked services, including, without limitation, any offer to sell or buy, or the sale or purchase of any product or service made on your behalf using our Goodtobenaked services; and we are not responsible for any loss or damage you suffer as a result of us or another user relying on any information you provided to us or to the other user that is not accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_9: We may at any time and at our sole discretion cancel your registration to use our Goodtobenaked services if you: violate these terms of use; attempt to register more than once; or do not log in to use our Goodtobenaked services for more than 30 days after receiving a cancellation notice from us.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_10: Subject to your compliance with these terms of use, we hereby grant you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable, revocable license to access and use our Goodtobenaked services for your personal use in accordance with these terms of use. We may update, change, modify, alter, amend, restrict, limit, suspend, withdraw or discontinue all or part of our Goodtobenaked services at any time and for any reason without notice, which may affect your ability to continue to access and use our Goodtobenaked services.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_11: You must not copy, reproduce, adapt, modify, distribute, republish, resell, download, display, communicate or transmit in any form or by any means all or part of our Goodtobenaked services without our prior written agreement, except to the extent expressly authorized by these terms of use; interfere with, alter, or disrupt the use of our Goodtobenaked services by any other user; interfere with, alter, or violate any security or authentication measures of our Goodtobenaked services; use data mining, screen scraping, or any similar technology to collect or extract data from our Goodtobenaked services without our prior written agreement; develop or use any third-party application or any other software that interacts with our Goodtobenaked services without our prior written agreement; reverse engineer, decompile or disassemble our Goodtobenaked services except to the extent permitted by law; access or use our Goodtobenaked services to distribute any virus or other harmful code; access or use our Goodtobenaked services for prostitution or solicitation; access or use our Goodtobenaked services to engage in fraudulent activity or any other activity that we determine, at our sole discretion, to be inappropriate or unsuitable for any reason; access or use our Goodtobenaked services to collect or store personal information about another user without that user's consent; access or use our Goodtobenaked services for the purpose of sending unsolicited commercial electronic messages or for any other commercial purpose; access or use our Goodtobenaked services in a manner that may harm our commercial interests, including, without limitation, for the purpose of operating a business competing with ours or soliciting users to use a service competing with our Goodtobenaked services; access or use our Goodtobenaked services in a manner that could damage or negatively affect our reputation or goodwill or the reputation or goodwill of any other user; access or use our Goodtobenaked services in violation of any applicable law; or access or use our Goodtobenaked services other than in compliance with these terms of use.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_12: You are responsible for obtaining and paying for all network service fees and charges and compatible hardware and software products you need to access and use our Goodtobenaked services. We do not guarantee that any particular hardware or software will be compatible with our Goodtobenaked services or that access to our Goodtobenaked services will be uninterrupted or error-free.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_title_3: Sale and Purchase of Products and Services
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_13: By using our Goodtobenaked services to sell products or services to other users, you agree to the following terms: (1) We are not able to verify the identity of the buyer and are not responsible for representing your interests or those of the buyer, except as expressly agreed. (2) Prompt and secure delivery of your product is also our responsibility. (3) We are not responsible for loss, theft, or unauthorized use of your product or service, or for payment delays from the buyer or receipt of the product or service. (4) We do not guarantee that the buyer will accept delivery or complete the transaction.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_14: By using our Goodtobenaked services to purchase products or services from other users, you agree to the following terms: (1) Goodtobenaked cannot validate the identity of the seller and does not act as an agent or representative for you or for the seller, except as expressly indicated. (2) Goodtobenaked does not represent and does not guarantee that the purchase or use of the product or service will not infringe the rights of a third party, including, but not limited to, copyright, trademarks, or other intellectual property rights. (3) You are solely responsible for accepting and complying with the terms and conditions of the contract concluded directly between you and the seller, including, without limitation, terms and conditions of the contract concerning payment, fees, taxes, delivery, warranties, title, risk, or insurance. (4) You are solely responsible for paying all applicable taxes in connection with the purchase of the product or service. (5) Goodtobenaked is not responsible for loss, theft, or unauthorized use or disclosure of the product or service, and is not responsible for any losses or damages you suffer because the seller delayed delivery of the product or service.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_15: You agree to pay us all fees and charges we notify you of that apply to our Goodtobenaked Services. All such fees and charges will be indicated in euros and will include any applicable goods and services tax, unless otherwise indicated.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_16: You warrant that you will only use a valid and current credit card or any other payment method that you are authorized to use to pay all fees and charges that apply to your use of our Goodtobenaked services.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_17: You agree that we may at any time notify you of new fees and charges that will apply to our Goodtobenaked services. By continuing to use our Goodtobenaked services after we have notified you of the new fees and charges that apply to our Goodtobenaked services, you will be deemed to have accepted and agreed to pay these new fees and charges.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_18: The intellectual property rights in the Site are not transferred to users by these terms and conditions. The content of the Site, including its structure, trademarks, designs, logos, software, programs, search engines, databases, domain names, and all other elements are the exclusive property of the Site and are protected by intellectual property rights. Members have the right to use the Site on a personal and non-exclusive basis to access the Services. Any unauthorized use is prohibited, including reproduction, representation, dissemination, marketing, or any use of the Services to design, produce, disseminate or market similar or equivalent services or offers. Such acts constitute a violation of intellectual property rights and are subject to prosecution under the Intellectual Property Code.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_20: By providing us with your information, you consent to us collecting, storing, using, and disclosing it in accordance with our Goodtobenaked privacy policy. You warrant that all information (including, without limitation, credit card details or other payments) that you provide to us in connection with our Goodtobenaked services will be accurate, complete, and current and that you will maintain the accuracy, completeness, and currency of all such information. You must not provide us with information about another person for any purpose unless you have obtained that person's express consent and have notified them of the details required by all applicable privacy laws.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_21: You agree to keep confidential and not disclose to a third party any information about another user that you receive in connection with your use of the Goodtobenaked services without the express written consent of the other user, unless disclosure is required by law.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_22: We may disclose your username to other users in connection with an offer to sell or buy, or the sale or purchase of a product or service that you make using our Goodtobenaked services. We are not responsible for any loss or damage you suffer as a result of making your user information available through our Goodtobenaked services, whether by you, by us, or by another user.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_23: You may report to us any product available on our Goodtobenaked site that, in your opinion, violates these terms of use or is illegal. We will review any product you have reported to us within 7 business days of receiving your report. If we determine that a product you have reported to us violates these terms of use or is illegal, we will immediately remove that product from our Goodtobenaked site.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_25: If you dispute a decision of ours regarding the removal of a product available on our Goodtobenaked site, the dispute must be resolved in accordance with the dispute resolution procedures contained in these terms of use.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_27: You may at any time terminate your access and use of the Goodtobenaked services by deleting your user account. If you terminate your access and use of the Goodtobenaked services, we may retain all fees and charges paid by you for the use of the Goodtobenaked services, unless the law requires us to refund these fees and charges.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_subtitle_28: Termination, Suspension, and Restriction by Us
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_28: If you violate any of these terms of use, we may, at our sole discretion, take one or more of the following actions: modify, cancel, or terminate any contract you have entered into with another user for the sale or purchase of any product or service; refund to the buyer of a product any amount that has been paid to us for the purchase of the product after deducting our fees and charges; immediately terminate, suspend or restrict your use of all or part of our Goodtobenaked services, including, without limitation, canceling your user registration and deleting your user account for our Goodtobenaked services; and initiate legal proceedings to recover from you any loss or damage we suffer as a result of your breach of these terms of use. We may at any time terminate, suspend, or restrict your access or use of the Goodtobenaked services without notice for any reason. If we terminate your access and use of the Goodtobenaked services, we may retain all fees and charges paid by you for the use of the Goodtobenaked services, unless the law requires us to refund these fees and charges.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_29: We may notify you of these terms of use by posting a notice on our Goodtobenaked site or by providing a notice through our Goodtobenaked services. If you are a registered user, we may also notify you of these terms of use by email to the address you provided to us. You may notify us of these terms of use by using the contact form available on our Goodtobenaked site. A notice given under these terms of use is deemed received: if provided through our Goodtobenaked services - immediately after providing the notice through our Goodtobenaked services; and if sent by email - on the day of sending unless the sender receives a notification of failed delivery.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_30: All returns/exchanges must be made within 5 days from the date of delivery. The item must be in its original condition, unused, and accompanied by all original tags and packaging. To make a return/exchange, please contact our customer service at help@goodtobenaked.com to obtain a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number. The customer is responsible for all shipping costs associated with the return or exchange, unless the item is defective or was shipped by mistake. Once the item is received and inspected, we will proceed with a refund or exchange of the item, depending on the customer's preference.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_31: All refund requests must be made within 5 days following the date of delivery. Refunds will be made in the same form of payment used for the original purchase.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_32: It is possible to cancel an order that has not yet been shipped. To cancel an order, please contact our customer service at help@goodtobenaked.com as soon as possible. If the order has already been shipped, we unfortunately cannot cancel it. Tangible goods must be shipped within three business days.
termsOfUse.terms_of_use_text_34: All packages will be sent within three days.
